title: Config
description:
Configuration for mutants-remote.

This is by default read from `~/.config/mutants-remote.toml`, or from the file specified by
`--config`.

aws_batch_job_definition.description: The name of the AWS Batch job definition to use.

aws_batch_job_queue.description: The name of the AWS Batch job queue to use.

aws_log_group_name.description: The AWS CloudWatch Logs group name to use.

aws_s3_bucket.description: The name of the bucket to store artifacts, including input source tarballs and results.
